content: TE-C-BK Parts Replacement parts for TE-C-BK rotary hammer core bits ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Higher coring performance, for longer – prolong the usable life of your TE-C-BK core bits Better avoid waste – economically replace only the centering pin as needed, not the whole rotary hammer core bit Applications Replacing worn-out or damaged components in TE-C-BK percussion core bits ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Base material: n/a Working mode: Hammer drilling, Drilling only Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Base material | n/a | System parts | Yes ### ITEMS- 28879 - Guide plate 1-1/2 BK-TW - Package Size 1 pc - 28848 - Core bit shank BK-BS 1-1/4 - 1-1/2 x 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 28880 - Guide plate 2 BK-TW - Package Size 1 pc - 28881 - Guide plate 2-1/2 BK-TW - Package Size 1 pc - 28850 - Centering pin BK-CP 1-1/4 x 1-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 28851 - Centering pin BK-CP 2 x 3-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 28849 - Core bit shank BK-BS 2-3.5x12 - Package Size 1 pc
